comments.comment:
Okma thamai mamath iye pereda indala me nittewa gena kiyana vedios walata.
 Hathilawwe me maanawa wargaya koti gahaddi koheda hitiye bolaw ? Wisheshayen negenahira palathe.
 Nikamata hithapiyawko asuchie goma godai wen kara ganna tharam wath buddiyak thiyenam this wasarak yuddayak thibunu  rataka athi bihisunu balapem athiunu pradeshak negenahira kiyanne.
 Negenahira saha anuradhapuren eha siyaluma maha kele wala ape sinha petaw bim angalak gane gahak gahak gaane badagaala thiyenawa.
A wagema gam waaseen maha re jeewath une oya kele walama thamai.
 Ehew kaaleka hitiye nethi minissu nodekka ranawiruwo nodakka me maanawa wargaya  den mathu wenne kohomada bolawne.
     Sri lankawa kiyanne deshapalana kumanthrana paara deesayak.
Me kuru minisunge kathawath ewan deshapalana  kumanthranayak ho kele paalu anthawadeenge kumanthranayak.
 Den inna minissu buddimath me gamwala inna minissunta aiberi kele pirala munwa godann.
  Mekath ekthara asbendumak thamai

comments.comment: Ane  boru nokiaya pala yannna... uba anuradhapura ‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂ª‡∑î‡∂´‡∑ë‡∂ú‡∂Ω amapara gihinwath yanwada ... e siddin wala muna dunna minissu kiyana kathaa e then walatama gihin balaban.  Me tharan kalayak wesengila hitiyaa e nittawange kathawa  eliyata awe madya nisa thama.  E nisa thama hema theninnma dakina minissu den baya nethuwa kiyanne. Nittewa netheth e ha samana sathwayek gana wananthara asrita gammana walata meetha kalinawa evith thiyanwa.  Anika yako nidahan ganna one nisa me kathawa heduwa kiyana eka uba kohomada danne.  Nidahan ganna yana un oyaa wage gon game gahanne ne bn... yako nidahan thiyenne me disthrikka thune vitharada.  Anika game pansale nidaha ganne sadda nethuwada. Uba hithwada nidahana gannawa kiyanne hora pol kadanawa wage deyak kiyala Minissunnta horen. veiws ganna balan me wage gon katha kiyanna epa yako mettek wage...
